__e: Kid, if we have to ramp down for a while, so be it.
Look, I like the way we talk. Just can we cool it for a bit, please?
No, what upset me is that you were willing to slow down for me to-to let me go down the wrong road, when that would've hindered you, because I couldn't grasp your work.
Not that you asked me my advice, but don't you think you ought to just slow down a little bit?
And, between you and me? Sometimes I wish I had taken it a little slower.
And, between you and me? Sometimes I wish I had taken it a little slower.
Maybe you should just cool it a little bit, make sure that you're doing the right thing... for everybody.
There's nothing wrong with us slowing things down.
I just think we need to cool things down for a while.

There's nothing wrong with us slowing things down.
I just think we need to cool things down for a while.

Something to slow down our enemies.
